snippet.title: Tundralia | Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After three years of development, we're excited to celebrate the early access launch of Tundralia: The Frigid Frontier, for PC on December 7th!

Tundralia: The Frigid Frontier invites players to embark on an epic adventure through a stylized open world filled with dense pine forests, frozen ice canyons, and frigid snow fields. As a novice adventurer, players will seek fame and fortune in this frozen wasteland, battling enemies using traditional tab target combat, completing quests, and uncovering a rising darkness threatening the land.
